modName: CN's RaceMenu and CBBE BodySlide Presets
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][color=#000000][u][i][b][size=4][color=#00ffff]Disclaimer[/color]
[/size][/b][/i][size=3][i][b]The BodySlide preset will appear slightly differently if not used with the RaceMenu preset. This is due to the RaceMenu preset having slightly different body morphs in-game that I edited to slighty adjust the body without having to rebuild all of my BodySlide outfits because I'm really lazy. Not a huge difference.

[/b][/i][/size][/u][/color][color=#000000][size=3][color=#ffffff]My BodySlide and RaceMenu presets that i made for personal use. Felt honestly kind of proud of them, probably the best I've ever made, and decided to share them.[/color]
[u][i][b]
[color=#00ffff][size=4]Requirements
[/size][/color][/b][/i][/u][/size][/color][/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide and Outfit Studio by Caliente and ousnius[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu by expired6978[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies
[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]﻿The Eyes Of Beauty by LogRaam[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55761]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for CBBE converted by drunkenmojo[/url], originally by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425]Zonzai for UNP and UNPB[/url]
[color=#00ffff][i][b]
Incredibly Strongly Recommended[/b][/i][/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89246]Shark Breast HDT by SharKHHH[/url] (personal favourite HDT body physics mod, plenty of different options) and all of it's requirements
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13377]Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic muscle by xs2reality
[/url]﻿

Just extract the archive and put the Data folder into your Skyrim game directory, normally drive:/Program Files(x86)/steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim
author: checkennegget
